content.rendered: I arrived a bit early for my swing dance class on Tuesday evening, and came across Mak fixing this humungous truck in Torrens St. He works for both the Islington Metal Works (by day) and Electrowerkz, the night club/music venue (by night), and this is what they use to haul large amounts of steel around. “Basically a tractor,” said Mak.
